This facility's contingency plan has not been reviewed since March 11, 2024. Failure to conduct annual contingency plan
reviews reduces the capability for disaster response and may impact animal welfare in the event of disasters. The facility
must ensure that the contingency plan is reviewed annually and that this review is documented. Additionally, this
documentation must be available to APHIS upon request. Correct by January 23, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
